description: President-elect Donald Trump is expected to choose Brooke Rollins, who heads a policy institute created to promote his agenda, as US secretary of agriculture, the Wall Street Journal reported Saturday.
title: Trump Expected to Pick Rollins as Agriculture Chief, WSJ Reports

description: COP29 appeared set for a last ditch deal as negotiators agreed the broad outline of a deal on finance, pulling the climate talks in Azerbaijan back from the brink of breaking down.
title: COP29 Deal in View as Key Nations Agree Outline, Negotiators Say

description: DAKAR, Senegal (AP) — At least six Russian mercenaries were killed in an attack by an al-Qaida-linked group in central Mali, according to a statement by the extremists on its media platform.
title: At Least Six Wagner Mercenaries Killed in Extremist Attack in Mali

description: In the end, the drama-filled search landed where it started — with a hedge fund executive who’d spent months methodically laying the groundwork for a nomination.
title: Trump Heeds Wall Street by Picking Scott Bessent as Treasury Secretary

description: An Israeli-Moldovan rabbi living in the United Arab Emirates has been missing since Nov. 21 in what Israeli authorities said was being investigated as a possible targeted attack.
title: Israel Says UAE-Based Rabbi Missing in Suspected Terror Incident

description: Mexico is looking beyond the incoming Trump administration’s threats of tariffs, betting on a bright future for global merchandise trade no matter what actions its northern neighbor and biggest trading partner takes.
title: Mexico Looks Past Trump Threats With $2.7 Billion Port Expansion

description: In the waning days of his administration, President Joe Biden is pushing to strengthen Ukraine’s position against Russia before the return of Donald Trump to the White House.
title: Biden Rushes to Bolster Ukraine Before Trump Takes Control

description: NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte met President-elect Donald Trump in Florida as Europe waits apprehensively to see how the next administration will approach the war in Ukraine.
title: NATO’s Rutte Meets Trump in Florida Amid Fears Over Ukraine Aid

description: Poland’s ruling party chose Warsaw’s mayor as its candidate in next year’s presidential election, as Prime Minister Donald Tusk seeks an ally to help deliver on his legislative agenda.
title: Polish Ruling Party Picks Warsaw Mayor for Presidential Race

description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s ruling alliance is leading in polls in Maharashtra by a wide margin, signaling policy continuity in a state which houses most of India’s billionaires and is home to some of the country’s biggest investments.
title: Modi’s Party Leads Maharashtra State Polls, Trails in Jharkhand

description: BEIRUT, Lebanon (AP) — Israeli airstrikes Saturday in central Beirut killed at least 20 people, officials said, as the once-rare attacks on the heart of Lebanon's capital continued without warning while diplomats scrambled to broker a cease-fire.
title: Israeli Strikes in Central Beirut Kill 20 as Diplomats Push for Cease-Fire

description: With winter still approaching, storage is being emptied faster than usual and gas prices have surged, raising echoes of the 2022 shock.
title: Europe Is Already Facing Its Next Energy Crisis

description: A few days after Labour’s landslide election victory in July, politicians gathered with aides and journalists at one of British politics’ glitzy annual summer parties. But amid the celebrating and free-flowing champagne, some senior ministers and staff were already worrying about a looming political headache — the promise Prime Minister Keir Starmer had made to allow a vote on legalizing assisted dying “early” in his administration.
title: Labour Rifts Open Over Assisted Dying Bill Starmer Encouraged

description: In October, ETH Zurich, Switzerland’s top technical university, tightened its admissions criteria for masters and PhD programs in certain science and technology fields. It justified the move as complying with Swiss laws to counter international espionage.
title: Swiss University Applies Stricter Measures to Chinese Students

description: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr.’s office said comments about assassination plans made by Vice President Sara Duterte constitute an “active threat” to his life that warrant “immediate proper action,” as the feud between the two powerful political families escalated.
title: Marcos’ Office Calls Duterte’s Comments a Threat to His Life

description: President-elect Donald Trump nominated surgeon and author Marty Makary to lead the Food and Drug Administration, picking a physician who openly criticized the agency during the pandemic to run the nation’s top drug regulator.
title: Trump Builds Health Team With FDA, Surgeon General Picks

description: President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Dave Weldon to be director of the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, tapping a former Florida politician and physician to lead the nation’s public health agency.
title: Trump Selects Former Congressman Dave Weldon for CDC Director

description: President-elect Donald Trump is tapping Scott Turner, a former NFL player and veteran of his first term to lead the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
title: Trump Picks NFL Veteran Scott Turner to Lead Housing Department

description: Hedge fund chief Scott Bessent’s Friday nomination to become the US Treasury Secretary is offering bond investors a glimpse into the incoming administration’s sweeping economic agenda after an extended search that included multiple prominent contenders.
title: US Treasury Pick Bessent ‘Is a Fiscal Hawk’: Wall Street Reacts

description: President-elect Donald Trump said he was naming Fox News medical contributor Janette Nesheiwat as his surgeon general, elevating another personality from the conservative network to a top role in his incoming administration.
title: Trump Names Fox News Contributor Nesheiwat As Surgeon General

description: President-elect Donald Trump says he will nominate outgoing US Representative Lori Chavez-DeRemer to lead the US Labor Department, a role in which she would oversee one of the country’s foremost economic statistical agencies.
title: Trump Picks Congresswoman Lori Chavez-DeRemer as Labor Secretary
